entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fort Erie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:05 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle early in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain. Windy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of showers. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
